scripts.coveralls: NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/lib/generate.test.js test/index.test.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.cover: NODE_ENV=test node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/lib/generate.test.js test/index.test.js
